job_details.degree_required: Any level degree in Network Computing

all: PeopleSoft Upgrades for HCM CRM and FSCM applications

jd: Dear Partner, Good Morning, Greetings from Nukasani Group Inc! We have below urgent long-term contract project immediately available for PeopleSoft Database Administrator DBA, Jackson, MS. Need submissions you please review the below role, if you are available, could you please send me updated word resume, and below candidate submission format details, immediately. If you are not available, any referrals would be greatly appreciated. Interviews are in progress, urgent response is appreciated. Looking forward for your immediate response and working with you. Candidate Submission Format - needed from you: Full Legal Name, Personal Cell No (Not google phone number), Email Id, Skype Id, Interview Availability, Availability to start, if selected, Current Location, Open to Relocate, Work Authorization, Total Relevant Experience, Education./ Year of graduation, University Name, Location, Last 4 digits of SSN, Country of Birth, Contractor Type, DOB: mm/dd, Home Zip Code. Assigned Job Details: Job Title: PeopleSoft Database Administrator DBA, Location: Jackson, MS, Rate: Best competitive rate, Experience must 15+ years. JOB DESCRIPTION: Must have prior expert level technical experience with Peoplesoft as well as some functional experience supporting PeopleSoft Pension Administration System and Perform all duties of upgrade including building demo, patching, initial test move, performance tuning, project planning, and all moves to production passes. Perform all duties of the application migration including building all environments, patching, developing migration plan, performing migration, testing, issue resolution, and performance tuning. REQUIRED DEGREE: Any level degree in Network Computing. REQUIRED CERTIFICATION(S) REQUIRED SKILLS/EXPERIENCE: # YEARS Experience as a PeopleSoft System Administrator / Database Administrator / Infrastructure design develop and deployment / Upgrade Specialist 15+, Experience specializing in large complex environments 15+, Experience with RDBMS operations on Oracle and MS SQL Server 15+, Infrastructure assessment 15+, Experiencing conducting an Oracle RAC upgrade, Oracle Database upgrade 15+, Previous experience performing all duties of upgrade including building demo, patching, initial test move, performance tuning, project planning, and all moves to production passes. 15+, Experience performing all duties of the application migration including building all environments, patching, developing migration plan, performing migration, testing, issue resolution, and performance tuning 15+, Knowledge of SCRUM 8+, Oracle Linux 7, Oracle Linux 8 5+, Oracle RDBMS 19c 4+, Oracle RAC 19c 4+, VMWare 6 and up 4+. APPLICATION EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: # YEARS PeopleSoft HCM 15+, FSCM 15+, CRM 15+, EPM 15+, IH 5+. PEOPLE TOOLS REQUIRED: # YEARS PeopleTools up to 8.6 11+, PeopleSoft 9.2 10+, PeopleSoft Update Manager 6+, PeopleSoft Upgrades for HCM CRM and FSCM applications 10+, PeopleSoft tools Upgrade for HCM, CRM, and FSCM applications 10+, PeopleSoft Update Manager, Oracle Linux 10+, Operator Security, Change Assistant, Data Mover, BI Publisher / XML Publisher, NVision 10+, Query, Process Scheduler 10+, Integration Broker, Application Server, REN server 10+. OPERATING SYSTEMS REQUIRED: # YEARS Windows 10+, Red Hat Linux 10+, Oracle Solaris 10+, Oracle Linux 10+. LANGUAGES REQUIRED: # YEARS Ruby 10+, SQL 10+, PL/SQL 10+, Transact SQL 10+, PERI 10+, Bourne Shell 10+. Preference given to candidates with the below skills/experience. Must also meet minimum requirements. VMWare, AWS, WebLogic, Tuxedo. Preferred Certifications: Oracle Certified Professional, ITIL Foundation Certified, PeopleSoft 8.48 PeopleTools Installation Server Administration; PeopleTools Upgrade and Data Management; PeopleTools I and II Accelerated.
